SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM( SELECT * FROM cia_shop cs LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT shop_name, COUNT(review_num) "review_count", AVG(review_star) "avg_star" FROM cia_review group by shop_name ) cr ON cs.shop_name = cr.shop_name LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT shop_name, COUNT(review_num) "reply_count" FROM cia_review_reply group by shop_name ) crr ON cs.shop_name = crr.shop_name WHERE cs.shop_category = #{category} ) tbl )
WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{countPerPage} AND rn <= #{pageNum} * #{countPerPage}

SELECT * FROM cia_shop cs LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT shop_name, AVG(review_star) "avg_star" FROM cia_review WHERE shop_name = #{shopName} group by shop_name ) cr ON cs.shop_name = cr.shop_name WHERE cs.shop_name = #{shopName}
